boardgame.name: Epic
Epic Card Game
Epic Gioco di Carte
boardgame.description: Epic is a fantasy card game by White Wizard Games which aims to recreate the TCG-style experience from a single box, with no additional purchases required._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Epic is a card game designed to start quickly but also to reward deep, strategic plays. In Epic, you take on the role of an elder god, in conflict with other elder gods. The cards in your deck are your champions, who fight for you, and events, which represent your will imposed on the mortal realm. In Epic, the turn sequence is easy but there are many options to choose from. You begin the game with a hand of five cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; each card costs either one gold or is free. You get one gold each turn _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t need to draw special resource cards or energy cards just to play with your other cards. Instead of figuring out which cards you might be allowed to play, you choose which card you want to play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Epic is non-collectable, so every box contains the same 120 unique event and champion cards, with 8 double-sided cards to represent temporary _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;token_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; champions. One box supports preconstructed, sealed and draft formats for 2-4 players, two boxes up to 8 players, and three if you want to create a full constructed deck or a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;cube_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; environment for drafting._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

White Wizard Games (WWG300) Epic is a fast paced card gamey of fantasy combat designed by the creators of the Star Realms Deckbuilding Game: Hall of Famers Rob Dougherty and Darwin Kastle. Epic provides all the great game play of a trading card game at a tiny fraction of the cost. Two to four players can play sealed, draft, or constructed out of a single box.

Kickstarter 1st edition, with all 12 year-one promo cards. Comes sleeved, cards in perfect condition. Two full sets available, with a discount if you want to buy the second (for a full 8-man sealed or draft): just $13 more. After sleeving, they don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t fit in the provided box. Instead, if you buy both sets, I will also mail in a 680-ct longbox to store all the cards, tokens, rulebook, and box.
